Instruction: Peel and seed the lychees, then roughly chop them.
In a blender, combine the chopped lychees, water, sugar, chopped fresh mint leaves, and lime juice.
Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Once churned, transfer the sorbet to a container and freeze for at least 4 hours before serving.
Serve the lychee mint sorbet as a refreshing and palate-cleansing side dish or dessert.
